author: Tracey Torble
message:
Merge pull request #1756 from nathanmcnulty/patch-2

Fix missing ** for bold

  "patch": "@@ -31,7 +31,7 @@ To assign or remove custom security attributes for a user in your Microsoft Entr\n \n 1. Make sure that you have defined custom security attributes. Browse to **Identity **Users** > **All users**.\n+1. Browse to **Identity** > **Users** > **All users**.\n \n 1. Sign in to the [Microsoft Entra admin center](https://entra.microsoft.com) as an [Attribute Assignment Administrator](~/identity/role-based-access-control/permissions-reference.md#attribute-assignment-administrator).\n \n-1. Sign in to the [Microsoft Entra admin center](https://entra.microsoft.com) as an [Attribute Assignment Administrator](~/identity/role-based-access-control/permissions-reference.md#attribute-assignment-administrator).\n \n-1. ai_summary.Response: This commit primarily makes minor textual adjustments to a Microsoft Entra ID documentation page regarding custom security attributes for users. The changes involve correcting the navigation path displayed in the instructions, ensuring it reads "Identity > Users > All users" instead of the previous "Identity Users > All users". This ensures clarity and accuracy for users following the guide.
